title: Fix admin panel access and routing

requirements.text: Verify and document the exact admin panel route URL in the frontend routing configuration

quotes: how to access my admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel route is clearly defined and accessible
Route path is documented in the application

requirements.text: Ensure the admin panel route properly checks for authentication via Internet Identity before allowing access
acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users are redirected to the login page when attempting to access /admin
AdminRoute protection wrapper correctly validates user identity

requirements.text: Verify that admin privilege verification is working correctly and that the user's identity is properly checked against the admin role in the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend receives and respects admin status from the backend
Non-admin authenticated users see appropriate error message

requirements.text: Add clear navigation link or button to the admin panel from the main navigation bar for authenticated admin users

quotes: how to access my admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: Admin link appears in navigation when user is authenticated as admin
Link is hidden for non-admin users
Clicking the link navigates to the admin panel

constraints: Must use existing Internet Identity authentication system
Must preserve existing AdminRoute protection wrapper
Must maintain role-based access control from backend
nonGoals: Adding new admin features beyond access improvements
